downloadDescription: We are releasing the code of some models used in our EMNLP-2015 paper, “WikiQA: A Challenge Dataset for Open-Domain Question Answering.” The code includes implementation of two models: Convolutional Neural Networks (CNN), and Logistic regression with CNN and count features (CNN-Cnt). Last published: October 30, 2015.
detailsSection: We are releasing the code of some models used in our EMNLP-2015 paper, “WikiQA: A Challenge Dataset for Open-Domain Question Answering.”  The code includes implementation of two models: Convolutional Neural Networks (CNN), and Logistic regression with CNN and count features (CNN-Cnt).  The models intend to judge whether a given sentence can be used to answer the input question.  Please refer to the README.txt file in the download and also the paper for detail.
